env HOME=$WORK/home
env $=$

! unparam .
cmpenv stderr stderr.golden

-- go.mod --
module testdata.tld/foo
-- stderr.golden --
$WORK/foo.go:5:19: ClosureUse$$1 - v is unused
-- foo.go --
package foo

func ClosureUse() {
	var enclosed int
	setValue := func(v *int) {
		enclosed = 2
	}
	var newValue int = 4
	println(enclosed)
	setValue(&newValue)
	println(enclosed)
}
